name: R5-DomainResource-R4-DomainResource
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 DomainResource into FHIR R4

element.display: A resource with narrative, extensions, and contained resources

target.display: A resource with narrative, extensions, and contained resources
target.comment: R5 `DomainResource` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DomainResource`
R5 `DomainResource.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DomainResource.contained`

R5 `DomainResource.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DomainResource.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `DomainResource.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DomainResource.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `DomainResource.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DomainResource.implicitRules`
R5 `DomainResource.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `DomainResource.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `DomainResource.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DomainResource.meta`

R5 `DomainResource.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DomainResource.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `DomainResource.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DomainResource.text`
